casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Fernando HURTADO. No. 17P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Amanda S. Zimmer, Southern Pines, for Hurtado, Fernando. Whitney Hendrix Belich, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of January 2016 by State of NC to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
